TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConventionBuilder extends System.Composition.Convention.AttributedModelProvider

summary.span: 提供用于创建和配置规则的方法，这些规则用于将 CLR 对象定义为 Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) 部件。

span.span: Provides methods for creating and configuring rules to define CLR objects as Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) parts.
